discourse_list.title: MakerMan voting address in case anyone wants to delegate MKR to my votes

content.content: Given I am intending to vote more and we can delegate our vote I thought it was time to complete the setup for the hot wallet I will be voting with in case anyone wants to delegate their MKR to me. This wallet got paid the first 4K DAI for the Black Thursday report and is generally used for Maker SourceCred here.  Over time I plan to just accumulate DAI funds + ETH (gas costs mostly) and buy MKR to stick in the associated cold wallet for voting and general Maker related stuff. MakerMan MKR voting hot wallet address 0x9AC6A6B24bCd789Fa59A175c0514f33255e1e6D0

They also mention their intention to accumulate DAI funds and ETH to buy MKR for voting and other Maker-related activities. The post does not fit into any of the other listed topics.

content.content: To clarify…Is there a delegated voting system that you’re using today? Or are you saying this for when one is eventually built?

Well my assumption was that we now could delegate (perhaps I am wrong?!) using the proxy.  Even if this is not true I still plan to use that particular hot wallet for all future Maker voting anyway.   I use it generally for Maker DAI payments from sourceCred, the first 4K grant for the Black Thursday report, etc.  My intention is to just use the DAI from sourceCred to pay for the voting and accumulate MKR that I probably will just put in the cold wallet.

content.content: I honestly don’t know the answer! I’ve always thought that vote delegation was something that still needed to be built.

Maybe I mistook the whole cold/hot wallet proxy as a new delegation.  I don’t know if that could be used to delegate MKR from multiple cold wallets to the hot voting wallet?   If so then we already have voting delegation but I could be totally wrong here.   I am sure someone like @Derek, @cmooney, or @LongForWisdom will chime in to clairify.

I am pretty sure this will not work for delegation. The proxy setup just helps for keeping a cold wallet cold and you can be sure the funds cannot move out of the proxy to anywhere else than the cold wallet in case the hot wallet gets hacked. But it is just ONE cold wallet so it does not work multiple people adding mkr to the proxy. Sorry
